people.title: Manage Conflict
people.primeDirective: Facilitate, donâ€™t dictate. Resolve at the source.
people.deepDive: PMI views conflict as an opportunity for growth. Distinguish between 'Functional' and 'Dysfunctional' conflict.
people.veteranTip: In my 16 years, I've found that technical 'disagreements' are often just lack of role clarity. Check the RACI first.

learnMore.logic: IF technical, THEN use 'Collaborating'. IF personal, THEN refer to 'Team Charter'.

process.title: Manage Budget
process.primeDirective: Baseline early, track often with EVM.
process.deepDive: Control costs using Earned Value Management (EVM) metrics like CPI and SPI.
process.veteranTip: Budgeting is about transparency. If you're 20% over, tell the sponsor why and show the recovery plan.

learnMore.logic: IF CPI < 1.0, THEN analyze root cause and update Risk Register.
learnMore.mindsetTip: Protect the baseline, manage the variance.

business.title: Manage Compliance
business.deepDive: Integrate audits and quality checks into the schedule.
business.veteranTip: I treat compliance as a 'Gate.' If it doesn't pass, we don't move. It saves millions later.

learnMore.logic: IF regulations change, THEN submit a Change Request.
learnMore.mindsetTip: Compliance is a risk you cannot 'Accept'.

formulas.name: CPI (Cost Performance Index)
formulas.scenario: Your Earned Value (EV) is $200,000, but your Actual Cost (AC) is $250,000. What is your status?
formulas.veteranInsight: Spending $1 to get $0.80 of value is a systemic failure. Check for scope creep immediately.

quizPool.question: A team member's performance has dropped. In a private meeting, they cite personal issues. What is your first action?

options.text: Report to HR for performance management.
Collaborate on a temporary flexible schedule.
options.feedback: Surgical: Emotional intelligence and servant leadership win.

quizPool.veteranLogic: Retaining talent is cheaper than hiring new talent. Support the human, solve the task.

mockExam.question: The project is in closing, but a stakeholder refuses to sign off because of a minor missing feature. What do you do?
options: Review the project scope and acceptance criteria.
mockExam.explanation: Acceptance criteria in the scope statement are the legal boundary for project completion.
